# R markdown Tutorial Translation in Chinese.

Yuzhao Pan

This is a Chinese translation of the official R markdown tutorial. The tutorial is a very useful resource, and the machine-translated version is almost unreadable. Therefore I created this version with my own translation.

The link to my document is:
